ingredients: 1 cup uncooked short-grain white rice, 1 cup water,   +   1/4 cup rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon white sugar,   +   1/2 cup imitation crabmeat, finely chopped,   +   1/4 cup mayonnaise, 8 sheets nori (dry seaweed), 2   +   1/2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 1  cucumber, cut into thin spears, 2  avocados - pitted, peeled, and sliced the long way
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 5mg 2%, Sodium 135mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 7mg 34%, Calcium 43mg 3%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 327mg 7%
